description:
Sanada Shirou is the Officer of Yamato`s Intelligence section. First mate and technical head. His rank is Lieutenant Commander. He was born in Nagano Prefecture.
Sanada Shirou oversees scientific analysis, information analysis, development, and engineering. Other than the technology officer, he also holds the post of first mate to Okita. As a genius who graduated at the top of MIT, his thinking is very logical and his analytical skills are unrivaled at assessing a situation. He advanced to the National Space Defense Academy after graduating from MIT, volunteered for UN Space Command and was assigned to the 9th Strategic Division. He is at the center of the Yamato Plan.
name: Sanada Shirou
